text:
Hi <@U0654TK92SY> ,
You can actually do both in HubSpot templates, depending on your desired functionality:
Are there any official guidelines on sizes/formats for theme, template, and section preview images? I always seem to wind up with extra whitespace underneath mine.
Hi <@U04AQA0QM8E> - Let me know if <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines/general-requirements#images|this link> helps.

Hmm, I appreciate the help, but I donâ€™t believe this is quite what I was looking for.

I was referring to the various preview images that appear in the dashboard interface when selecting a theme in the settings panel, choosing a template when creating a page, adding a theme section to a page, etc.
Sent you a Loom video. Let me know if that was more what you were looking for.
